resources.string: In this demo your device act as both camera and viewer, the videos are encoded and decoded in the same environment. The data is being pushed from encoder to decoder using a simple queue.
In this demo your device act as both camera and viewer and a simple local web socket server is activated. Video stream is pushed from source to viewer through this local web socket.
In this demo your device act as both camera and viewer. Video stream is pushed from source to viewer through the relay server.
In this demo your device act as camera. You should use another device as the viewer. Video stream is pushed from source to viewer through the relay server.
In this demo your device act as viewer. There should be another device as camera. Video stream is pushed from source to viewer through the relay server.
